name: edwood
description: Library for building in-browser schema-aware XML editors

scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run node && npm run phantom
scripts.compile: node ./node_modules/typescript/bin/tsc --removeComments  --noImplicitAny --outDir tmp --target ES5 --module commonjs src/ui.ts src/test-node.ts src/test-phantom.ts
scripts.lint: node ./node_modules/tslint/bin/tslint -c src/tslint.json -f edwood.d.ts -f src/dom.ts -f src/grammar.ts -f src/hashing.ts -f src/library.ts -f src/parser.ts -f src/pattern.ts -f src/phantomjs.d.ts -f src/test-node.ts -f src/test-phantom.ts -f src/ui.ts
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run index
